main event: A civilian reported a large cylindrical object with flashing lights in Brooklyn, New York, in September 1962.
interesting points: The object was wingless and made no exhaust or sound,The object had two white exhaust panels emitting pulsating lights,The sighting occurred at night,The object was described to be the same size as a large plane,The duration of the observation was not fully reported.
sighted object: large cylindrical object with flashing lights
